getResultingBoard

public BoardMatrix getResultingBoard(BoardMatrix parent,
                                     Game.Player player,
                                     BoardMatrix.Position move)
Get the board resulting from a given player's move at a given position of a given board.

Parameters:
parent - The board from which the result will be generated.
player - The player making the move which will modify the parent.
Returns:
The board resulting from this set of rules when the specified player plays at the specified position of the specified parent board.

getChildBoards

public java.util.List<BoardMatrix> getChildBoards(BoardMatrix parent,
                                                  Game.Player player)
Get the list of board resulting from all possible legal of a given player on a given board.

Parameters:
parent - The board from which the result will be generated.
player - The player making the move which will modify the parent.
Returns:
The list of boards resulting from each move this set of rules allows the given player to make on the given board.

getLegalMoves

public java.util.List<BoardMatrix.Position> getLegalMoves(BoardMatrix board,
                                                          Game.Player player)
Get the list of moves this set of rules permits the specified player to make.

Parameters:
board - The board under consideration for the given player.
player - The player whose legal moves we wish to collect for the given board.
Returns:
A set of position where the specified player can play on the given board.

tryMove

public Game.State tryMove(BoardMatrix.Position p,
                          BoardMatrix board,
                          Game.Player player)
Attempt to play at a specified position on a specified board in the name of a specified player.

Parameters:
p - The position where the specified player is attempting to move.
board - The board upon which all this action action takes place.
player - The player attempting to make a move
Returns:
  • Game.State.MOVE_FAILURE if by these rules the move is illegal. In this case and only this case the move is not performed!
  • Game.State.VICTORY if by these rules the move results in victory for the moving player.
  • Game.State.DRAW if by this rules the move results in a draw.
  • Game.State.MOVE_SUCCESS in all other circumstances.

    • getFirstPlayer

    public abstract Game.Player getFirstPlayer()
    Check which player is supposed to play first by these rules.

    Returns:
    The player who, by these rules, moves first.

    canMove

    public abstract boolean canMove(BoardMatrix board,
                                Game.Player player)
    Check if a given player is able to make any move at all at this point, by these rules.

    Parameters:
    board - The board upon which the move is considered.
    player - The player considering the move.
    Returns:
    True if and only if by the rule-set the specified player can make a move on the specified board.

    isDraw

    public abstract boolean isDraw(BoardMatrix board)
    Check if the game is a draw at this point, by these rules.

    Parameters:
    board - The board we are considering to determine if the game is a draw.
    Returns:
    True if and only if by this rule-set the specified board is in a state of stalemate.

    hasWon

    public abstract boolean hasWon(BoardMatrix board,
                               Game.Player player)
    Check if the specified player has won the game at this point, by these rules.

    Parameters:
    board - The board we are considering to determine if the game has ended.
    player - The player to check for victory.
    Returns:
    True if and only if by this rule-set the specified player has accomplished all victory conditions on the specified board.

    getValue

    public abstract int getValue(BoardMatrix board,
                             Game.Player player)
    Return the specified player's score at this point, by these rules.

    Parameters:
    board - The board in consideration.
    player - The player whose score we wish to know or estimate.
    Returns:
    The integer value of the specified board for the specified player, based on this rule-set: can be a heuristic estimate or 0 for games with no scoring system.

    isLegalMove

    public abstract boolean isLegalMove(BoardMatrix.Position p,
                                    BoardMatrix board,
                                    Game.Player player)
    Check the legality of a move for a given player on a given board.

    Parameters:
    p - The move in consideration.
    board - The board upon which the move is considered.
    player - The player considering the move.
    Returns:
    True if by this rule-set the specified move is legal on the specified board by the specified player.

    createBoard

    public abstract BoardMatrix createBoard()
    Create a board to play the game defined by these rules.

    Returns:
    A brand-new and deep BoardMatrix with the correct size to play the game defined by this rule-set.

    reset

    public abstract void reset(BoardMatrix board)
    Reset the specified board to the starting position implied by these rules.

    Overrides:
    toString in class java.lang.Object
    Returns:

    performMove

    protected abstract void performMove(BoardMatrix.Position p,
                                    BoardMatrix board,
                                    Game.Player player)
    Alters the given board based on a given move by a given player: this method is protected to ensure that the legality of the move is tested before it is called!

    Parameters:
    p - The position to play the move at.
    board - The board upon which the move shall be played.
    player - The player playing the specified move
